title: I Took My Trousers Off With 400 People | StreetSmart
description: In this video, Max Fosh takes off his trousers in public with 400 people as part of a social experiment.
summary: Max Fosh conducts a social experiment by taking off his trousers in public with 400 people.
payoff: The payoff comes from the reactions of the people around him as they witness this unexpected act, creating a humorous and surprising situation.
